data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This picture shows a waiter holding a tray on his shoulder. There are six dishes on the tray. It seems to be Asian cuisine. The waiter wears a watch on his left wrist and he is blowing a whistle. In addition, he is bold. I think he is very tired. This reminds me of my university life when I worked in a restaurant as a part-time waiter. It was extremely exhausting, but I had to do this job as I need to sustain my life in a foreign. I hope people working in difficult conditions can achieve what they want eventually.
